title: Bruins notebook: Brad Marchand improves, Cross gets call
text:
Published By: Boston Herald Bruins - Today 
WILMINGTON — There hasn’t been a lot of good news for the Bruins in the first week of the season, but there was yesterday: Brad Marchand...
